description: Defines the mandatory input schema for the P-01 Calculus (S-01 Trust and S-02 Risk floor calculation).

required_metrics.purpose: S-01 Input - Real-time systemic health and latency data.
S-02 Input - Measures dynamic risk exposure based on memory/compute pressure.
S-03 Input - Measures delta between deployed state and ideal GRS state compliance.
S-01 Input - Static assessment of evolutionary M-02 test suite robustness.
